wikitext.*:
'''''Onwards to the Spectral Defile''''' was [[Cirith Gorgor (band)|Cirith Gorgor]]'s first full length album. It was released in [[1999]] on Osmose Records, produced by Cirith Gorgor and E. Hermsen, and recorded at BBA.
